header.text: Welcome to the online store of the company 'PCMaster'! Always up-to-date prices and high-quality service! Prompt delivery in Saratov and the region from 9:00 to 22:00! Any other questions? Call us and our consultant will explain everything to you!
advantages.title: advantages
advantages.text1: 5% discount when you register and make your first purchase
advantages.text2: The discount is valid if you register on our website and place an order on the same day.
advantages.text3: Delivery in Saratov is free of charge
advantages.text4: Delivery is free to any point of Saratov. Upon delivery in the region, the price is negotiated with our consultant.
advantages.text6: The quality of our products is not in doubt, so we safely provide a long-term guarantee for everything.
footer.title: about us
footer.text: We are engaged in computer technology. In a short time, we have established ourselves as a reliable partner who strictly fulfills its obligations!
